spell.name: Fissure
spell.description: Destroy the 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that has the lowest ATK (your choice, if tied)..

spell.name: Change of Heart
spell.description: Select and control 1 opposing monster (regardless of position) on the field until the end of your turn.

spell.name: Stop Defense
spell.description: Select 1 Defense Position monster on your opponentÅfs side of the field and charge it to Attack Position.

spell.name: Follow Wind
spell.description: Increase the ATK and DEF of a Winged-Beast-Type monster equipped with this card by 300 points.

trap.name: Negate Attack
trap.description: When an opponentÅfs monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, then end the Battle Phase.

trap.name: Trap Hole
trap.description: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

trap.name: Mirror Force
trap.description: When an opponentÅ's monster declares an attack: Destroy all Attack Position monsters your opponent controls.

monster.name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
monster.description: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

monster.name: Celtic Guardian
monster.description: An elf who learned to wield a sword, he baffles enemies with lightning swift attacks.

monster.name: Tyhone
monster.description: Capable of firing cannonballs from its mouth for long-range attacks, this creature is particularly effective in mountain battles.

monster.name: Hane-Hane
monster.description: FLIP : Select 1 monster on the field and return it to its owner's hand..

monster.name: Man-Eater Bug
monster.description: FLIP: Target 1 monster on the field, destroy that target.

monster.name: Turtle Tiger
monster.description: A tiger encased in a protective shell that attack with razor-sharp fangs.

monster.name: Harpie Lady
monster.description: This human-shaped animal with wings is beautiful to watch but deadly in battle

monster.name: Curse of Dragon
monster.description: A wicked dragon that taps into dark forces to execute a powerful attack.
